column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: According to preliminary reports
column4: there was another fire that started around 6:25 pm on February 25
column5: 2020.------A property near the Chroy Changvar bridge in Daun Penh district caught alight
column6: although it is not yet clear why.------Authorities and  several fire trucks
column8: and traffic jams across the bridge were reported. ------KBN
